snippet: A judge ruled Thursday that a 13-year-old boy who was 10 when he killed his neo-Nazi father will spend at least the next seven years in a state juvenile facility.
abstract: California Judge Jean R Leonard rules that a 13-year-old boy who was 10 when he killed his neo-Nazi father Jeffrey Hall will spend at least the next seven years in a state juvenile facility.
lead_paragraph: A judge ruled Thursday that a 13-year-old boy who was 10 when he killed his neo-Nazi father will spend at least the next seven years in a state juvenile facility.

headline.main: California: Boy’s Penalty for Killing Neo-Nazi Father
headline.print_headline: California: Boy’s Penalty for Killing Neo-Nazi Father
